Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummidaththil En Aaththumaavai Uyarththugiren.
2 en Dhevane, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren, Naan Vetkappattuppogaadhapadi Seyyum; En Saththurukkal Ennai Merkondu Magizhavidaadheyum.
3 ummai Nokkik Kaaththirukkira Oruvarum Vetkappattup Pogaadhapadi Seyyum; Mugaandharamillaamal Dhurogampannugiravargale Vetkappattup Povaargalaaga.
4 karththaave, Ummudaiya Vazhigalai Enakkuth Theriviyum; Ummudaiya Paadhaigalai Enakkup Podhiththarulum.
5 ummudaiya Saththiyaththile Ennai Nadaththi, Ennaip Podhiththarulum; Neere En Ratchippin Dhevan, Ummai Nokki Naalmuzhudhum Kaaththirukkiren.
6 karththaave, Ummudaiya Irakkangalaiyum Ummudaiya Kaaruniyangalaiyum Ninaiththarulum, Avaigal Anaadhikaalamudhal Irukkiradhe.
7 en Ilavayadhin Paavangalaiyum En Meerudhalgalaiyum Ninaiyaadhirum; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Dhayavinimiththam Ennai Umadhu Kirubaiyinpadiye Ninaiththarulum.
8 karththar Nallavarum Uththamarumaayirukkiraar; Aagaiyaal Paavigalukku Vazhiyaith Therivikkiraar.
9 saandhagunamullavargalai Niyaayaththile Nadaththi, Saandhagunamullavargalukkuth Thamadhu Vazhiyaip Podhikkiraar.
10 karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaiyaiyum Avarudaiya Saatchigalaiyum Kaikkollugiravargalukku, Avarudaiya Paadhaigalellaam Kirubaiyum Saththiyamumaanavaigal.
11 karththaave, En Akkiramam Peridhu; Ummudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Adhai Manniththarulum.
12 karththarukkup Bayappadugira Manushan Evano Avanukkuth Thaam Therindhukollum Vazhiyaip Podhippaar.
13 avan Aaththumaa Nanmaiyil Thangum; Avan Sandhadhi Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththukkollum.
14 karththarudaiya Ragasiyam Avarukkup Bayandhavargalidaththil Irukkiradhu; Avargalukkuth Thammudaiya Udanbadikkaiyaith Theriyappaduththuvaar.
15 en Kangal Eppodhum Karththarai Nokkik Kondirukkiradhu; Avare En Kaalgalai Valaikku Neengalaakkividuvaar.
16 enmel Nokkamaagi, Enakku Irangum; Naan Thaniththavanum Sirumaippadugiravanumaayirukkiren.
17 en Irudhayaththin Viyaagulangal Perugiyirukkiradhu; En Idukkangalukku Ennai Neengalaakkividum.
18 en Thunbaththaiyum En Varuththaththaiyum Paarththu, En Paavangalaiyellaam Manniththarulum.
19 en Saththurukkalaip Paarum; Avargal Perugiyirundhu, Ukkirapagaiyaai Ennaip Pagaikkiraargal.
20 en Aaththumaavaik Kaappaatri Ennai Viduviyum; Naan Vetkappattuppogaadhapadi Seyyum; Ummai Nambiyirukkiren.
21 uththamamum Nermaiyum Ennaik Kaakkakkadavadhu; Naan Umakkuk Kaaththirukkiren.
22 dhevane, Isravelai Avanudaiya Ellaa Ikkattugalukkum Neengalaakki Meettuvidum.
